channel.title: 2d on Blue Visual v03
channel.description: Recent content in 2d on Blue Visual v03

item.title: Guardiome
item.description: Guardiome is a genomics company that gives people easy access to their genome. I worked with them to design branding, the website and its graphics, product renders, and much more. I am now the Chief Creative Officer at Guardiome.

item.title: Giant
item.description: A procedural gas giant generator engineered in Filter Forge.

item.title: Stargaze
item.description: Being a photographer, I love experimenting with time and light, and I also personally love space and the night sky, so naturally a great way to bring all of those things together is by doing long exposure star trails.
